sourcesContent:
export const personas = {
  maya_associate: {
    id: 'maya_associate',
    name: 'Maya Chen',
    title: 'Young Associate',
    age: 27,
    image: '/Maya_Chen.png',
    description: '2nd-year associate at mid-size firm',
    background: 'Law school graduate, limited practical writing experience',
    painPoints: [
      'Struggles with concise, persuasive writing',
      'Needs quick, actionable feedback',
      'Prefers digital, mobile-friendly learning'
    ],
    learningPreferences: [
      'Scenario-based practice',
      'Peer collaboration',
      'Immediate feedback'
    ],
    quote: "I need to write briefs that actually persuade judges, not just show I read cases.",
    designPriority: 'practical_application',
    contentApproach: 'scenario_based',
    alexQuestion: 'How will you balance rigor with accessibility?'
  },
  
  robert_partner: {
    id: 'robert_partner',
    name: 'Robert Martinez',
    title: 'Senior Partner',
    age: 42,
    image: '/Robert_Martinez.png',
    description: '15-year litigation partner',
    background: 'Experienced lawyer, mentors junior staff',
    painPoints: [
      'Limited time for training',
      'Wants proven, credible content',
      'Needs to see ROI on learning investment'
    ],
    learningPreferences: [
      'Efficiency-focused',
      'Real case examples',
      'Expert-led content'
    ],
    quote: "Show me how this makes my team write better briefs, faster.",
    designPriority: 'efficiency_roi',
    contentApproach: 'expert_led',
    alexQuestion: 'What metrics will prove ROI to partners?'
  },
  
  patricia_judge: {
    id: 'patricia_judge',
    name: 'Patricia Williams',
    title: 'Federal Judge',
    age: 58,
    image: '/Patricia_Williams.png',
    description: 'Federal district judge, guest instructor',
    background: '20+ years bench experience, teaches legal writing',
    painPoints: [
      'Sees poor writing quality in submissions',
      'Values traditional rigor with modern relevance',
      'Expects professional standards'
    ],
    learningPreferences: [
      'Standards-based approach',
      'Historical context',
      'Practical application'
    ],
    quote: "Lawyers must write clearly. Lives and livelihoods depend on it.",
    designPriority: 'professional_rigor',
    contentApproach: 'standards_based',
    alexQuestion: 'How will you modernize without losing standards?'
  }
};
